data.name: Global Azure Bootcamp Austria 2020
data.description: All around the world user groups and communities will come together from April 23 - April 25, 2020 once again in the seventh Global Azure Bootcamp event. Join us on Friday, April 24, 2020 in Linz.

relatedRecords.description: Date of the Workshop Sunday, 18 August 2019.
